sectionHeading: Weekend Events / Traffic Impacts for May 8 - 9

event: Starting Monday 5/10 on W Short St at N Mill St and N Upper St.
Signals will be flashing red All-Way stops from 7 p.m. to 6 a.m. each evening.
Signals will be normal Red-Yellow-Green operation at all other times.
Lexington Ballet presents "A Journey Through the School" at the Lexington Opera House at 7:00 p.m.
Please follow all CDC guidelines as well as Kentucky state government directives and recommendations.
